title: Bill Burr
description:
Kevin sits down with Actor and Comedian Bill Burr to discuss Bill’s most recent Saturday Night Live monologue, their Covid-19 quarantine experiences and the last time they each cried. 

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Bill Burr, Kevin Hart)
